name: chem_reformulator
description: Reformulate skincare molecules. Parameters: ingredient_name (string), smiles (string)
schema: [{"id":0,"property":"ingredient_name","type":"string","description":"Name of the skincare ingredient, e.g. Retinol, Vitamin C, Niacinamide","required":true},{"id":1,"property":"smiles","type":"string","description":"SMILES molecular structure, e.g. CCO, CC(=O)O","required":true}]
